Tue, 11 Feb 2025 02:00:00 +0000 Grace Millane was murdered in 2018 by her Tinder date. The appeal set up in her name aims to support victims of abuse.
Prime Minister Christopher Luxon speaks after poll, David Seymour tensions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-speaks-poll-poll-david-seymour-tensions/qi7z5fofy5bz3n2n2lri5i2btj6e/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-speaks-poll-poll-david-seymour-tensions/qi7z5fofy5bz3n2n2lri5i2btj6e/ Raphael FranksLuxon says Seymour letter 'ill-advised'. Seymour hit back, said PM didn't know the facts. Mon, 10 Feb 2025 18:16:00 +0000 Prime Minister of New Zealand Christopher Luxon appears on Newstalk ZB Mike Hosking Breakfast. Photo / Michael Craig.
Whangārei brothers admit roles in Shayden Perkinson’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/whangarei-brothers-brothers-admit-inmit-im--in-shayden-perkinson-death/i6ec3mkag5hs5oiv7wydlhi3ky/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/whangarei-brothers-brothers-admit-inmit-im--in-shayden-perkinson-death/i6ec3mkag5hs5oiv7wydlhi3ky/ Shannon PitmanShayden Perkinson died trying to protect his cousin at an ATM in 2023. Mon, 10 Feb 2025 18:00:00 +0000 Bronson Manuel (left) pleaded guilty with injuring with intent and Samson Manuel pleaded guilty to murder of Perkinson in the Whangarei High Court. Photo / NZME
State Highway 79 in Geraldine closed after crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/state-highway-79-in-geraldine-close-closed-after-crash/uawgzqgp65cdfnhkzoccmmyt7xe/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/state-highway-79-in-geraldine-close-closed-after-crash/uawgzqgp65cdfnhkzoccmmyt7xe/ Raphael FranksFire crews were called to the rural Canterbury crash about 5.15am. Mon, 10 Feb 2025 17:26:00 +0000 NZTA said SH 79 near Geraldine was closed at the intersection of Pleasant Valley and Tiplady Rds.
Environmental watchdog praises Whangaroa hapū for successful anti-mining campaign https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/environmental-watchdog-praises-whangaroa-haparoa-hapu-for-for-succescessful-successful-anti-mining-mining-mining-mining-mining-cmampaign/qcilofuzsvcxva3izcqjnl4cry/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/environmental-watchdog-praises-whangaroa-haparoa-hapu-for-for-succescessful-successful-anti-mining-mining-mining-mining-mining-cmampaign/qcilofuzsvcxva3izcqjnl4cry/ Mike DinsdaleWhangaroa hapū's successful anti-mining opposition praised Mon, 10 Feb 2025 17:00:01 +0000 Whangaroa hapū and Forest & Bird members at Manginangina Scenic Reserve, in a kauri forest west of Kerikeri, protesting mineral prospecting permits on conservation land last year. Their opposition has seen an Australian company pull out of plans to mine the area.
Far North news in brief: Peace reigns at Waitangi; SH10 work and house fire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-north-north-north-north-in-brief-peace-reigns-reigns-at-waitangi-sh10-work-sh10-work-house-house-fire/heetx3p6 yhzghljauatycfxwiai/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-north-north-north-north-in-brief-peace-reigns-reigns-at-waitangi-sh10-work-sh10-work-house-house-fire/heetx3p6 yhzghljauatycfxwiai/News snippets from the Far North. Mon, 10 Feb 2025 17:00:01 +0000 Waitangi Day commemorations in the Bay of Islands were attended by tens of thousands. Police say the event was peaceful with no arrests made.
